title: SAY!
lyrics:
Lyric It's - SAY!

[Romanization]

sasireun na mariya
bijobeun saejang soge
tumyeonghan cheolchange
gathyeoisseosseo

mupyojeonghan mare
balmogeul butjaphyeo
jigeumi animyeon
yeongwonhi nal su eopseoseo

Where are you going now?
moreuneun goseuro
Where are you headed now?
nareul chajeureo

Say yeah nae simjangi teojige
Say yeah nae sumi beokchaoreuge
miryeomboda huhoega naa
Live your life, make it feel like mine
Say yeah nalgo sipeun daero

han baljagungman heotdidyeodo
dwicheojindago
geunyang geopjuneun marideorago
da geojimmariya

neoui churage gikkeoi
hamkkehal teni
haneureul dwijibeo
du pareul beollyeo
I’ll be there, no matter where' you are

Say yeah nae simjangi teojige
Say yeah nae sumi beokchaoreuge
miryeomboda huhoega naa
Live your life, make it feel like mine
Say yeah nalgo sipeun daero

We say
We say, we’ve got this
mothalge eopji
We say
We say, we're ready
jumbi da dwaetji

Don't say
Don't say you're nothing
keuge oechiji
Don’t say
Don't say you're falling
saecheoreom nalji

Say yeah nae simjangi teojige
Say yeah nae sumi beokchaoreuge
miryeomboda huhoega naa
Live your life, make it feel like mine
Say yeah nalgo sipeun daero


[Hangeul]

사실은 나 말이야

비좁은 새장 속에

투명한 철창에

갇혀있었어



무표정한 말에

발목을 붙잡혀

지금이 아니면

영원히 날 수 없어서



Where are you going now?

모르는 곳으로

Where are you headed now?

나를 찾으러



Say yeah 내 심장이 터지게

Say yeah 내 숨이 벅차오르게

미련보다 후회가 나아

Live your life, make it feel like mine

Say yeah 날고 싶은 대로



한 발자국만 헛디뎌도

뒤처진다고

그냥 겁주는 말이더라고

다 거짓말이야



너의 추락에 기꺼이

함께할 테니

하늘을 뒤집어

두 팔을 벌려

I’ll be there, no matter where' you are



Say yeah 내 심장이 터지게

Say yeah 내 숨이 벅차오르게

미련보다 후회가 나아

Live your life, make it feel like mine

Say yeah 날고 싶은 대로



We say

We say, we’ve got this

못할게 없지

We say

We say, we're ready

준비 다 됐지



Don't say

Don't say you're nothing

크게 외치지

Don’t say

Don't say you're falling

새처럼 날지



Say yeah 내 심장이 터지게

Say yeah 내 숨이 벅차오르게

미련보다 후회가 나아

Live your life, make it feel like mine

Say yeah 날고 싶은 대로
name: Its - SAY!
